bdi4jade.belief

Class DerivedPredicate<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.core.MetadataElementImpl
      • bdi4jade.belief.AbstractBelief<K,V>
        • bdi4jade.belief.DerivedBelief<K,java.lang.Boolean>
          • bdi4jade.belief.DerivedPredicate<K>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Belief<K,java.lang.Boolean>, Predicate<K>, MetadataElement, jade.content.Concept, jade.content.ContentElement, jade.content.Term, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public abstract class DerivedPredicate<K>
extends DerivedBelief<K,java.lang.Boolean>
implements Predicate<K>
    This class represents a logic predicate that is derived from other agent belief. The evaluation of this predicate is not given, but derived from other values of a belief base.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • DerivedPredicate

        public DerivedPredicate()
        The default constructor. It should be only used if persistence frameworks are used.

      • DerivedPredicate

        public DerivedPredicate(K name)
        Creates a new derived predicate. The value of this belief cannot be set as it is derived from other values of a belief base.
        Parameters:
        name - the belief name.
